title: eVisa to Moscow
content:
eVisa Requirements:
Biometric Passport: A biometric passport valid for at least 6 months is essential.
Valid Email Address: Provide a valid email address for communication.
Credit or Debit Card: A credit or debit card authorized for online purchases is required to pay the application fee.
Passport-Sized Photograph: A recent passport-sized photograph must be submitted.
Medical Insurance: Medical insurance covering the entire stay is mandatory (exemptions may apply).
All supporting documentation can be provided in electronic format, and some documents, such as proof of medical insurance and photographs, can be gathered at your convenience and submitted at a later stage.
Application Process
Complete the Online Application Form: Provide all required information accurately in the online application form.
Upload Supporting Documents: Upload digital copies of relevant supporting documents.
Pay the Application Fee: Use a credit or debit card to pay the application fee online.
Once your eVisa is granted, it will be sent to the email address you provided during the application process.

ATTENTION! The permitted period of stay in the Russian Federation on the basis of an e-visa of up to 16 days DOES NOT IMPLY the possibility of staying for 384 hours net time (24 hours x 16). The day of arrival and the day of departure are counted as two days.
Find out more on this website "https://russian-e-visa.com/evisa-to-moscow/"

title: Extension of Registration and Student Visa
content:
Please do not forget to submit documents to the Office of Visas and Registrations (office 3423-1) not later than 45 days before the end of your visa / registration!
To extend registration and student visa, you should bring the following documents:

For foreign citizens and stateless persons (visa entry):
Application for the Visa and Registration Renewal
Passport (original + 2 copies of all significant pages of the passport)
Migration card (original + 2 copies)
The original of the previous registration
Medical insurance
Photo 3x4
Copy of the educational contract
Receipt for payment of state duty for a visa (1600 rubles)
If you live at a private address, you need to make registration by yourself and confirm at the university that you have a valid registration at the place of residence. Please do not forget to promptly renew the registration at a private address and send each new registration to the email address of the International Student Office.
In accordance with Federal Law No. 163-ФЗ of June 27, 2018, registration of foreign citizens is carried out strictly at the place of their actual residence.
